resources.string: Showing still video captures from the beginning/middle/end of each video. These images are built into YouTube, and no external API is used

Showing DeArrow provided crowd-sourced thumbnails. These thumbnails are often more relevant than the ones provided by YouTube. Thumbnail requests will be sent to the DeArrow API server, and no other data is sent.

If DeArrow has no thumbnails, %s

%s
then instead the original YouTube thumbnails will be shown
then instead the YouTube provided still image captures will be shown.
Tap here to learn more about DeArrow
